Title: Professor
Research: semiconductor quantum dots, quantum optical studies
full_research: Understanding, manipulating and exploiting electronic, spin and photonic quantum phenomena in semiconductors and nanostructured electronic and photonic materials. Optical, electronic and spintronic properties of semiconductor quantum dots and wires fabricated from Aimonides, group-IV materials (Si, SiGe, C) and II-VI semiconductors and oxides (CdSe, ZnO). Quantum optical studies of dielectric and metallic nano-photonic materials and the application of such systems for applications in quantum information processing, metrology and sensing.
